author: Gaël Beaudoin
message: Nice event, nice people and some interesting visitors ... fun fun :)

author: annma
message: wow guys, now I really missed not having been there. Maybe next year. You all look amazing!

replies.author: Aurélien
replies.message:
Would be great to see you next year, Annma!

Of course we all look amazing, we are KDE contributors after all :)

author: Jos Poortvliet
message: Gosh, I got one of those Gnomie t-shirts as well. I must say I like the style of most gnome t-shirts. Especially the Foot + Computer = Love t-shirt. So simple, yet effective. I do like our own artwork but it's often too complicated and technical to communicate the emotion it should embody. Esp an issue on t-shirts and other promo things.
